title: A bunch of questions about the Star Guardian 2017 skins.
body:
So I have a bunch od questions about these beautiful new star guardian skins!
1. When can we excpect their splash arts?
2. Will they have a login screen?
3. Will they have a music video like last year?
4. Who chose the Champions for the skins because they all fit really well.
I dont expect and answer for every question but i placed them in order from the one that interests me most to the one that interests me the least.

replies.body:
1 About a week probably.
2 Yes
3 Probably
4 Riot employees.
I believe they deliberate what champions get skins as a whole team + the higher ups most likely have influence because it is a business after all.
